statements: DELETE FROM CustomerComplaints WHERE customer_id = 100 AND resolution = 'Resolved';
DELETE FROM CustomerComplaints WHERE customer_id = 5 AND date_created < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM complaints WHERE complaint_id = 100 AND customer_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM resolutions WHERE resolution_id IN (SELECT resolution_id FROM complaints WHERE complaint_date < '2021-01-01');
DELETE FROM resolutions WHERE resolved_at < NOW() - INTERVAL '1 year';
DELETE FROM CustomerDetails WHERE customer_id = 100 AND contact_number = '1234567890';
